results.name: Least splitter of the harmonic numbers H(n) and H(n+1).
comment: See A227631 for the definition of least splitter.
link: Clark Kimberling, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: h[n_] := h[n] = HarmonicNumber[n]; r[x_, y_] := Module[{c, d}, d = NestWhile[#1 + 1 &, 1, ! (c = Ceiling[#1 x - 1]) < Ceiling[#1 y] - 1 &]; (c + 1)/d]; t = Table[r[h[n], h[n + 1]], {n, 1, 120}];
Numerator[t]   (* A227630 *)  (* _Peter J. C. Moses_, Jul 15 2013 *)
